name: Harold Reborn
description:
Harold Reborn is a challenging open-world adventure and sequel to Harold's Walk.
Uncover the secrets in an unusual and mysterious realm by searching the overworld and 9 sub-worlds for over 90+ hidden objects and mysterious messages.
Harold's new abilities will have him rocketing over hills and across wide gaps at ultra fast speeds.

Walk right into a new adventure.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

Game is compatible with the Nintendo 3DS family of systems. When played on New Nintendo 3DS XL, additional features may be available. Visit Nintendo.com for more details.
